title: Put this 2 Bedroom on your to-see list! You'll be glad you did!
posting_body: ['RENT:', 'Please call  |', 'SIZE:', '1094 sq ft |', 'BEDROOMS:', '2 |', 'BATHROOMS:', '2', 'LEASE TERMS:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'show contact info', 'ABOUT COMMUNITY:', "The living spaces at Polo Club Apartments are thoughtfully designed for comfort and convenience in mind, and are stylishly appointed with the kind of premium materials and finishes you won't find in any other rental apartments in Stone Mountain, GA.", 'Pet Policy: A maximum of 2 pets per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', '$15 monthly pet fee.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50 lbs.', 'For more information, please call our leasing office.', 'UNIT FEATURES:', '● Breakfast Bar', '● Cable Ready', '● Carpet', '● Dining Room', '● Dishwasher', '● Disposal', '● Extra Storage', '● Range', '● Tub/Shower', '● Vinyl Flooring', '● Air Conditioning and Gas Heating', '● Brushed Nickel Lighting Package', '● Cozy Fireplaces', '● Huge Floorplans up to 1300 sq.', 'ft.', '● Newly Updated Apartments', '● Patio or Balcony', '● Roommate Floor Plans', '● Walk-In Closets', '● Washer & Dryer Connections', 'COMMUNITY FEATURES:', '● Business Center', '● Clubhouse', '● Community Events', '● On Marta bus-line', '● Pet Care', '● Picnic Area', '● Playground', '● Tennis Court', '● Cardio & Fitness Center', '● Clothes Care Center', '● Electronic Rent Payment', '● Minutes to Stone Mountain park', '● On-Site Management', '● Package Receiving', '● Resort Style Swimming Pool', '● Shopping, Dining, and Entertainment Nearby', 'CONTACT US TODAY!', 'Polo Club Apartments', '100 Ashley Creek Cir', 'Stone Mountain, GA 30083', 'Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Professionally managed by Ventron Management', 'Equal Housing Opportunity.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'D225BF0D9D4E426']
